content: Didn't the Genaral staff just take the H&K away rrom the snake eaters. Now ,(ACCORDING) to ARMY TIMES, the 75th rangers are getting the SCAR,(600) for field operations/trials. They will replace the many verations of M-16 / M-4 -M-4A1's that are currently in use.I think it's about time. ANY COMMENTS ? IF THE ENEMY IS IN RANGE , SO ARE YOU. I.Y.A.O.Y.A.S.
